body_html:
Hi zhangyaobit, I have tried with the ptb example with update collection utility, I still get this error under version 1.4.1

Traceback

(most recent call last):
File "ppmodel.py", line 558, in
tf.app.run()
File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 48, in run
_sys.exit(main(_sys.argv[:1] + flags_passthrough))
File "ppmodel.py", line 524, in main
tf.train.import_meta_graph(metagraph)
File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py", line 1810, in import_meta_graph
**kwargs)
File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/meta_graph.py", line 696, in import_scoped_meta_graph
ops.prepend_name_scope(value, scope_to_prepend_to_names))
File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py", line 3035, in as_graph_element
return self._as_graph_element_locked(obj, allow_tensor, allow_operation)
File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py", line 3077, in _as_graph_element_locked
"graph." % (repr(name), repr(op_name)))
KeyError: "The name 'Train/TrainInput/StridedSlice_1:0' refers to a Tensor which does not exist. The operation, 'Train/TrainInput/StridedSlice_1', does not exist in the graph."

body:
Hi zhangyaobit, I have tried with the ptb example with update collection utility,   I still get this error under version 1.4.1

> Traceback
> 
>  (most recent call last):
>   File "ppmodel.py", line 558, in <module>
>     tf.app.run()
>   File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 48, in run
>     _sys.exit(main(_sys.argv[:1] + flags_passthrough))
>   File "ppmodel.py", line 524, in main
>     tf.train.import_meta_graph(metagraph)
>   File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py", line 1810, in import_meta_graph
>     **kwargs)
>   File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/meta_graph.py", line 696, in import_scoped_meta_graph
>     ops.prepend_name_scope(value, scope_to_prepend_to_names))
>   File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py", line 3035, in as_graph_element
>     return self._as_graph_element_locked(obj, allow_tensor, allow_operation)
>   File "/home/ubuntu/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py", line 3077, in _as_graph_element_locked
>     "graph." % (repr(name), repr(op_name)))
> KeyError: "The name 'Train/TrainInput/StridedSlice_1:0' refers to a Tensor which does not exist. The operation, 'Train/TrainInput/StridedSlice_1', does not exist in the graph."
>
